transformations.name: mappedEmailRecipients
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: mappedEmails
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: MapDrifted2
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> RawEmailRecipient
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> RawEmails
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> domains
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> RawEmployee
RawEmailRecipient derive(er_id = toString(byName('id')),
		er_recipient_id = toString(byName('recipient_id')),
		er_email_id = toString(byName('email_id')),
		er_status = toString(byName('status')),
		er_created_at = toString(byName('updated_at')),
		er_updated_at = toString(byName('updated_at')),
		er_through_list = toString(byName('through_list')),
		er_read_delay = toString(byName('read_delay')),
		er_mailbox_message_id = toString(byName('mailbox_message_id')),
		er_is_read = toString(byName('is_read')),
		er_read_time = toString(byName('read_time')),
		er_delivered_date = toString(byName('delivered_date'))) ~> mappedEmailRecipients
RawEmails derive(em_id = toString(byName('id')),
		em_sender_id = toString(byName('sender_id')),
		em_parent_id = toString(byName('parent_id')),
		em_email_thread_id = toString(byName('email_thread_id')),
		em_subject = toString(byName('subject')),
		em_date = toString(byName('date')),
		em_message_id = toString(byName('message_id')),
		em_created_at = toString(byName('created_at')),
		em_updated_at = toString(byName('updated_at')),
		em_mailbox_message_id = toString(byName('mailbox_message_id')),
		em_perimeter = toString(byName('perimeter')),
		em_is_answer = toString(byName('is_answer')),
		em_is_event_message = toString(byName('is_event_message')),
		em_in_reply_to = toString(byName('in_reply_to')),
		em_time_zone = toString(byName('time_zone')),
		em_thread_subject = toString(byName('thread_subject')),
		em_is_forwarded = toString(byName('is_forwarded'))) ~> mappedEmails
mappedEmailRecipients select(mapColumn(
		er_id,
		er_recipient_id,
		er_email_id,
		er_status,
		er_created_at,
		er_updated_at,
		er_through_list,
		er_read_delay,
		er_mailbox_message_id,
		er_is_read,
		er_read_time,
		er_delivered_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectedEmailsRecipients
mappedEmails select(mapColumn(
		em_id,
		em_sender_id,
		em_parent_id,
		em_email_thread_id,
		em_subject,
		em_date,
		em_message_id,
		em_created_at,
		em_updated_at,
		em_mailbox_message_id,
		em_perimeter,
		em_is_answer,
		em_is_event_message,
		em_in_reply_to,
		em_time_zone,
		em_thread_subject,
		em_is_forwarded
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectedsEmails
WithEmails derive(yearWeek = concat(
    toString(year(toTimestamp(em_date))),
    '-',
    toString(weekOfYear((toTimestamp(em_date))))
)) ~> withYearWeek
RawEmployee derive(emp_id = toString(byName('id')),
		emp_email_address = toString(byName('email_address')),
		emp_exit_date = toString(byName('exit_date')),
		emp_active = toString(byName('active')),
		emp_domain_id = toString(byName('domain_id')),
		emp_user_id = toString(byName('user_id')),
		emp_mailbox_user_id = toString(byName('mailbox_user_id')),
		emp_last_call_success = toString(byName('last_call_success')),
		emp_time_zone = toString(byName('time_zone')),
		emp_locale = toString(byName('locale')),
		emp_admin = toString(byName('admin')),
		emp_is_list = toString(byName('is_list')),
		emp_entry_date = toString(byName('entry_date')),
		emp_user_unique_id = toString(byName('user_unique_id')),
		emp_country = toString(byName('country')),
		emp_language = toString(byName('language')),
		emp_encrypted_email_address = toString(byName('encrypted_email_address')),
		emp_analytics_end_date = toString(byName('analytics_end_date')),
		emp_analytics_start_date = toString(byName('analytics_start_date')),
		directory_type = toString(byName('directory_type')),
		emp_data_extracted_until = toString(byName('data_extracted_until')),
		is_directory_ressource_account = toString(byName('is_directory_ressource_account'))) ~> MapDrifted1
domains derive(dom_id = toString(byName('id')),
		dom_url = toString(byName('url')),
		dom_company_id = toString(byName('company_id'))) ~> MapDrifted2
MapDrifted1 select(mapColumn(
		emp_id,
		emp_active,
		emp_domain_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectEmployees
MapDrifted2 select(mapColumn(
		dom_id,
		dom_url,
		dom_company_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectDomains
selectEmployees, selectDomains join(emp_domain_id == dom_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> employeeWithDomains
selectedEmailsRecipients, employeeWithDomains join(er_recipient_id == emp_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> emailRecipientWithRecipients
emailRecipientWithRecipients, selectedsEmails join(er_email_id == em_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> WithEmails
withYearWeek sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'yearWeek',
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		em_id,
		em_sender_id,
		em_parent_id,
		em_email_thread_id,
		em_subject,
		em_date,
		em_message_id,
		em_created_at,
		em_updated_at,
		em_mailbox_message_id,
		em_perimeter,
		em_is_answer,
		em_is_event_message,
		em_in_reply_to,
		em_time_zone,
		em_thread_subject,
		em_is_forwarded,
		er_id,
		er_recipient_id,
		er_email_id,
		er_status,
		er_through_list,
		er_read_delay,
		er_mailbox_message_id,
		er_is_read,
		er_read_time,
		er_delivered_date,
		yearWeek
	)) ~> Sink
